document_data.name: Kudzu
document_data.mainbody: '''Kudzu''' was a type of edible trailing perennial vine [[plant]] related to the common pea. Kudzu grew quickly overtaking and smothering other vegetation in the area.
document_data.Habitats:
* [[Elminster's tower]] in [[Shadowdale]] was covered in thick vines of pink and purple flowering kudzu. The size of the growth suggested it was left unchecked for over a century.
* Kudzu was very prevalent throughout the [[Long Forest]].<ref>
